metadata.name: Sacred Structures #1
metadata.description:
Sacred Structures #1:  It's the first of a series of short animated pieces about the contemplation of existence.


Existence, a mystery beyond measure,  
Beyond the realm of space and time.  
Eternity, a boundless treasure,  
Inscribed with numbers, a sacred rhyme.

The universe, a symphony so grand,  
With patterns, forms and mathematical grace.  
Each element a part of the grand plan,  
In harmony, it moves at a steady pace.

The fabric of reality, so thin and light,  
A matrix of numbers, a masterwork of art.  
The truth of existence, just beyond our sight,  
A mystery waiting, within the human heart.
